Package com.flipkart.business

Interface CustomerServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerServiceImpl
public interface CustomerServiceInterface
Interface for Customer Service, providing various functionalities for managing customer operations such as registration, login, booking slots, and viewing profiles.

  • Method Details

    • getAllGymCenterDetailsByCity

      List<GymCentre> getAllGymCenterDetailsByCity(String city)
      Retrieves a list of gym centers based on the provided city.
      Parameters:
      city - the city for which gym center details are requested
      Returns:
      a list of GymCentre objects representing gym centers in the specified city

    • getCustomerBookings

      List<BookingDetails> getCustomerBookings(String customerId)
      Retrieves a list of bookings for the specified customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer whose bookings are requested
      Returns:
      a list of BookingDetails objects representing the customer's bookings

    • bookSlot

      boolean bookSlot(String userID, Date date, String slotId, String centreId)
      Book a slot for the specified customer.
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the customer who is booking the slot
      date - the date on which the slot is being booked
      slotId - the ID of the slot being booked
      centreId - the ID of the gym center where the slot is being booked
      Returns:
      true if the slot is successfully booked, false otherwise

    • cancelBooking

      void cancelBooking(String bookingID)
      Cancels a booking for the specified customer.
      Parameters:
      bookingID - the ID of the booking to be canceled

    • customerLogin

      boolean customerLogin(String userName, String password)
      Logs in the customer with the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the customer
      password - the password of the customer
      Returns:
      true if login is successful, false otherwise

    • register

      Customer register(Customer customer)
      Registers a new customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - the Customer object containing registration details
      Returns:
      the newly registered Customer object

    • viewMyProfile

      Customer viewMyProfile(String customerId)
      Returns the profile of a customer for the provided customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer
      Returns:
      the Customer object representing the customer's profile

    • customerChangePassword

      void customerChangePassword(String userName, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws WrongCredentialsException
      Changes the password of the customer.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the customer
      oldPassword - the current password of the customer
      newPassword - the new password to set
      Throws:
      WrongCredentialsException - if the old password does not match

    • getSlotIdFromGymCentreAndTimestamp

      String getSlotIdFromGymCentreAndTimestamp(String gymCentreId, Timestamp timestamp)
      Returns the slot ID for the specified gym center and timestamp.
      Parameters:
      gymCentreId - the ID of the gym center
      timestamp - the timestamp for the desired slot
      Returns:
      the ID of the slot, or null if no slot is available

    • getCustomerIdFromNameAndPass

      String getCustomerIdFromNameAndPass(String userName, String password) throws WrongCredentialsException
      Retrieves the customer ID from the username and password.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the customer
      password - the password of the customer
      Returns:
      the customer ID
      Throws:
      WrongCredentialsException - if the credentials are incorrect

    • getBookingCountFromSlotId

      Integer getBookingCountFromSlotId(String slotId)
      Retrieves the count of bookings for a given slot ID.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the ID of the slot for which the booking count is requested
      Returns:
      the count of bookings for the specified slot

    • getGymCentreCapacityFromCentreId

      Integer getGymCentreCapacityFromCentreId(String centerId)
      Retrieves the capacity of a gym center based on the provided center ID.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the ID of the gym center for which the capacity is requested
      Returns:
      the capacity of the specified gym center

    • addSchedule

      String addSchedule(Timestamp timestamp, String slotId)
      Adds a new schedule to the system.
      Parameters:
      timestamp - the timestamp for the schedule
      slotId - the ID of the slot for the schedule
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly created schedule

    • getGymCentreCostFromCentreId

      float getGymCentreCostFromCentreId(String centerId)
      Retrieves the cost of a gym center based on the provided center ID.
      Parameters:
      centerId - the ID of the gym center for which the cost is requested
      Returns:
      the cost of the specified gym center

    • addPayment

      String addPayment(String bookingID, float amountPaid)
      Adds a new payment to the system for a booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingID - the ID of the booking for which the payment is made
      amountPaid - the amount paid for the booking
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly created payment
